name: Ultimate Plinko Demo
description: Ultimate Plinko is a game where you drop a plinko ball in order to get the most points. You obtain the points by hitting the poles on each map. There are also boosters to boost how many points you get each hit. Get to the next level by getting at least 100 points in each level, and if you don't, you start all over at level 1. There are 10 levels.
